entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is a house-elf who is nervous and beckons Harry closer.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main character in the story, to whom Dobby is speaking.

entities.name: professor dumbledore
entities.description: Professor Dumbledore is a respected character who has secrets and silence kept by Dobby.

entities.name: malfoys
entities.description: The Malfoys are a family about whom Harry asks Dobby if he can speak freely.

relationships.description: Dobby is speaking to Harry Potter.
Dobby is loyal to Professor Dumbledore and keeps his secrets.
Harry Potter asks Dobby about the Malfoys.
